Package it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ViewMaker
    Interface defining methods that create new views for the ClientInstance objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientInstance
    An object representing a client, handling all the client logic (i.e.
    GameClientManager
    An object that links the client connection to the UI views about the game.
    TurnClientManager
    Object that links the UI view to the connection events, receiving requests from server and sending responses from the UI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClosedException
    Used to immediately rewind the stack in case of close requested by the user.
    TurnInterruptedException
    Exception thrown when the server truncates the turn for time out.
